749820.name: Villages™
749820.description:
Villages™ is a game that combines interesting mechanics from many other sandbox games.

It aims to let People face a variety of gameplay and scenario by conducting a few basic rules.

KEY FEATURES

  • Economy, the game's world will have limited resources, so ones will not get the same resources and amount.
    People will then form an economy by using the trading system in the game.

  • You can make a product with different tiers, from hand-crafted to factory-made.
    Each tier varies in cost and benefit and makes it dynamic to the whole economy.

  • Construction differs from a traditional sandbox game. Villages™ lets you construct a building as if in real life by using construction sites, tools, and vehicles.

  • Skill-Based, People can choose their skill to advance, but with limited skill points.
    So you must balance your skill branches and benefit from them.
    Everyone will depend on other People's abilities and form their society.
